metadata.subject: Alan Dershowitz Twitter activity regarding false accusations

relationships.description: Dershowitz claims Boies is lawyer for his false accusers
Dershowitz is described as Trump lawyer

analysis.purpose: To publicly challenge David Boies and dispute false accusations against Dershowitz
analysis.significance: Shows ongoing legal disputes and public defense strategy regarding allegations

notable_quotes: "David Boies, the lawyer for both of my false accusers, joining in, has admitted in private that his client has falsely accused me"
"Your conclusion is simply wrong. I challenge Boies to deny this admission under oath"
red_flags: Claims of private admissions contradicting public positions

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - appears to be public dispute over legal allegations

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - this is a social media post about legal disputes and allegations

details: Twitter platform used for public statement

public_knowledge.context: Alan Dershowitz has been involved in high-profile legal cases and controversies, including connections to Jeffrey Epstein cases and representing Donald Trump

analysis.summary: Alan Dershowitz uses Twitter to publicly challenge lawyer David Boies, claiming Boies privately admitted that his clients falsely accused Dershowitz, and challenges him to deny this under oath.
